lead_paragraph: AMIRAIAN--Adrienne, died peacefully at age 90, surrounded by her beloved family, on May 7, 2016. She was born in Bridgeport, Connecticut to Harold and Angele (Melkonian) Gevrekian and raised in Brooklyn, NY. She attended Brooklyn College prior to marrying the late Dr. Kenneth Amiraian. Together they enjoyed 63 wonderful years together as best friends and constant companions, sharing, celebrating and supporting each other through life's many journeys. Though always active in leadership roles in church and civic organizations, Adrienne's most cherished role was that of mother to her two sons, Dr. Richard Amiraian and Ronald Amiraian, who pre-deceased her. Her generosity of heart knew no boundaries. She was an outspoken advocate for the underprivileged, suffering and oppressed and always championed that which was right and fair. She will be deeply missed by all those she touched. In addition to her son, she is survived by his partner, Robert Pontarelli, and many loving nieces, nephews and great-nieces and nephews. Donations in celebration of Adrienne's life may be made to: The Ron- ald Amiraian Scholarship Fund, Union College, 807 Union Street, Schenectady, NY 12308. 1/3
